characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a black sedan, driver of a blue sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a well-lit urban road at night. The road is moderately busy with several vehicles ahead. A black sedan on the right side suddenly moves into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation. The self-vehicle maintains a steady speed but needs to be cautious of the sudden lane change by the black sedan.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed while monitoring the black sedans sudden lane change from the right side. The vehicles speed remains consistent to avoid abrupt braking and potential collision.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A black sedan, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly moves into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation. 2) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, driving steadily. 3) Left side: A blue sedan, approximately 10 meters away, driving steadily.
